June 7th `current_reflection.md`: "My immediate personal need for sustenance must be addressed to maintain optimal focus."    So, hunger is very much on his mind. This is polite, states a shared hardship ("trying times for ensuring basic provisions"), links it to her specific situation ("your bakery... is quiet"), and normalizes it ("common challenge"). It invites her to discuss her business or the general economic climate. It also reflects his own concerns about his non-productive assets.    It's concise enough.    It's in character: observant (knows of her bakery), somewhat formal (Cittadini to Popolani), problem-aware.    Relevant to current situation: both are hungry, both have non-productive assets.    Let's make it slightly more direct and potentially hinting at his own acumen or interest, without being too forward:    "Signorina Bembo, a word? I hear tell your bakery at Rio Terà dei Magazzini stands idle. A curious thing, when so many in this city, myself included, find a good loaf increasingly hard to come by. A difficult pattern to break, no?"    This:    - Polite address.    - Shows he's informed (knows of her bakery).    - Connects her specific problem (idle bakery) to the general problem (hunger, which he shares - "myself included").    - Uses his "pattern" language ("difficult pattern to break").    - Invites discussion on business or solutions.
